segments.text: Excuse me , I have something to trouble you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ? I'll be very glad if I could be of any help to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An hour ago , I bought this vase with my tourist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I remember it clearly . Is there anything wrong with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid so . We found this crack on the bottom when I went back to my hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how awful ! Let me have a look , I'm terribly sorry . It was most thoughtless of me . Would you excuse me , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , It's quite all right , I suppose . It can't be helped sometimes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very kind of you to say so . How about changing another one for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a minute , please . I won't be long . I'm sure this one is perfect . You may examine it carefully .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , it is . I'll take this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry for any inconvenience I've caused you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there's no reason to apologize for such a trifle thing .
segments.speaker: S1
